name: Superposition (Plasmahirn)
description:
You are seperated into two instances of yourself. By controlling both of these instances, try to make it through all levels, to reallign with your other self.

Controls:
- Move by using "A"&"D" or "<-"&"->"on your keyboard
- Jump with spacebar
- Use your mouse to klick buttons in menus
